answers.answer: My son was born at 34w 2d and stayed in the NICU for 2weeks. I got transfered the 27 and had my son. The 28th and didn't get out 30 December .

I had my twins at 32 weeks, but went in to preterm at 19 weeks originally. The dr stopped it I did recieve the stetoid shots. My daughters stayed in the hospital for three weeks. I stayed four days after my c section.
I had my twins at 27 Weeks, my daughter didn't make it, but my son stayed in nicu for 50 days.I was in for four days 2 days after a c-section due to my daughters funeral..

I didn't have my son early but rather late, I was 42w6d if I deliverd him 45 mins later I would have been 43w eek! But he was NICU for 48hours cause he had mecoinum asperation. I had an emergency c-section with him & was in the hospital for the full 4 days. But with my second c-section I was out a day & a half later. Jolgonz, I'm so sorry for your loss and glad your other child & all your ladies children are okay!!
I was in the nicu with my baby for 3 months I had her at 25 weeks (6 months). As far as how long you'll be there depends on the baby or if there are any complications.

With my first pregnancy my son was born at 35weeks at 4lbs 7oz. He stayed 6days in the nicu then got to come home. I had an emergency c section due to preeclampsia and i had to stay in the hospital for 5days. They couldn't get my bp stabilized. So i came home a day before my son.

question: I just have a couple questions for the moms that had their baby early and they needed to stay in the nicu. How early did you have him? And how long did he/she have to stay at the hospital? Also, how long did they keep you there? The normal two days? Or four days because of a c-section? Longer? I would appreciate any and all advice!
title: Nicu
